# GitHub Actions Workflows

- **CI** (`ci.yml`) - Lint, type check, test, build, bundle size, benchmarks
- **Release** (`release.yml`) - Publish to npm using changesets and OIDC
- **Docs** (`docs.yml`) - Deploy docs to GitHub Pages
- **PR Title** (`pr-title.yml`) - Validate conventional commit format
- **CodeQL** (`codeql.yml`) - Security scanning
